item.title: About | Academy of Dance and Theatre Art | Prabhat - The Temple of Art
item.description: Prabhat, The Temple of Art is an internationally renowned artistic institution from India. The organization has created stage history with a unique blend of tradition along with sophisticated stage techniques of the present technological era. The ability to communicate effectively by employing innovative and creative choreography along with audio-visual craftsmanship has made this group distinctive. “Prabhat” (which incidentally means artists as lively as the dancing rays of dawn) – was one of the first organizations that has overcome the language barrier and presented themes in classical dance forms using contemporary techniques.
